implementationProcess.title: Implementation Process
implementationProcess.description: Streamline your entire NetSuite implementation lifecycle — from discovery to go-live — with a proven, secure methodology.

steps.title: Discovery & Planning
steps.desc: Analyze current retail operations, systems, and customer journey requirements
steps.details: Comprehensive analysis of your existing retail operations, including process mapping, system evaluation, and requirements gathering. We identify gaps and opportunities for improvement.

steps.title: System Design
steps.desc: Design NetSuite configuration for retail workflows and customer touchpoints
steps.details: Create a detailed blueprint for your NetSuite implementation, including system architecture, integration points, and customization requirements specific to retail processes.

steps.title: Configuration & Integration
steps.desc: Configure NetSuite modules and integrate with POS, e-commerce, and other systems
steps.details: Implementation of NetSuite configuration based on the approved design, including custom script development, workflow automation, and integration setup.

steps.title: Testing & Training
steps.desc: Comprehensive testing and training for retail staff across all locations
steps.details: Thorough system testing including unit, integration, and user acceptance testing. Comprehensive training programs for all user groups to ensure smooth adoption.

steps.title: Go-Live & Optimization
steps.desc: Production deployment with ongoing support and performance optimization
steps.details: Carefully managed production deployment with real-time monitoring, immediate support, and post-implementation optimization to ensure successful system adoption.
